Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Jose Lanuza
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone 2 weeks ago and Is a nice phone, arrived on time, excellent camera, nice screen , .........

Reviews.Title: awsome
Reviews.Author: tori johnson
Reviews.Content: This phone is by far the best I have had in a long time I'm still figuring out apps on it

Reviews.Title: Amazing, fast, and reliable
Reviews.Author: J. Delatorre
Reviews.Content: The phone is huge, the pics are fine, in some cases a little grainy yet, nothing that the naked eye can actually pick up. Phone might be a little confusing to use for those who, like I, are pretty dubious when it comes to handling a complex electronic device.

Reviews.Title: the screen blacks out!
Reviews.Author: Jorge Del Castillo
Reviews.Content: This seems to be a common problem with HTC titans. It has happened to my phone three times and searching over the internet found that it is a common problem for this type of phones. the way to fix it range from withdrawing the battery and chip for a few minutes to put the cell phone in the refrigerator and amazingly it came back to life after it. The phone would be awesome if it not were for this kind of issues. You better get a more trustworthy cell.

Reviews.Title: really nice phone
Reviews.Author: Joseph Jacob
Reviews.Content: windows phone is better than expected but i cant upgrade to windows phone 8the screen and build quality is amazing

Reviews.Title: htc titan
Reviews.Author: iraklis
Reviews.Content: very good phone nice phone, works very god and very fast. it is a bit big but it has a perfect screen

Reviews.Title: Really good service
Reviews.Author: Carlos Ocampo
Reviews.Content: It actually got to its destination faster than they said and everything was complete. And also prices are really good to get the stuff you want.

Reviews.Title: Phone is as described
Reviews.Author: A. Lewis
Reviews.Content: The phone looks great,works great and come with unlock code. It works automatically when I enter my sim card and then insert pin number. Good seller and communicates promptly.

Reviews.Title: It's LOCKED!
Reviews.Author: Dejan
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone and I need it unlocked, but I get locked one... It's really good phone, but if I can't use it on my (serbian) network, i don't need it any more...

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Content: I am satisfied with everything with this phone. The camera is nice. And you can down load many apps with this including Netflix, Skype etc.
